description: Details required by condition nos 3d (details of all open land within site, including hard or soft landscaping, including details of type and size of trees within site showing associated tree pits together with any proposed exterior lighting.) and 4b (all boundary treatment including any walls, fences, railings or balustrades that do not form part of Blocks 1A, 1B, 2, 3,4 or 5)) of planning permission 19/00148 (Variation of condition 2 (compliance with approved drawings) of planning permission PP/16/03238 for alterations to Blocks 3 including reducing the number of one bedroom and three bedroom units and providing additional two and four bedroom units, regularisations to elevations, as well as internal reconfiguration of lower ground floor level to align with basement and ground floor level of the building, and creation of lightwells at lower ground floor level within Blocks 2 and 3; variation of condition 4f (detailed drawings of the photovoltaic cells and their relationship to each roof) of planning permission PP/16/03238 to state 'condition has been removed'; variation of condition 5 (parking to be provided before residential occupation) of planning permission PP/16/03238 to add wording 'no greater than', and; variation of condition 39 (extra care facility management plan) of planning permission PP/16/03238 to state 'condition has been removed'. (MAJOR DEVELOPMENT))
